commit 07e8afb8d4c0c17b19a61d41dd0919849b6bfa1e
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-03-09 17:03:38 +0100

    Allow to use channel to synchronize Cache
    
    When the clear timeout of the cache is zero, we launch a thread to synchronize
    caches if the back-end support channels.
    The thread is started on the first call to sync for the database.
    The channel is also used to clear the cache of the process initiating the
    clearing. This allows to test the mechanism is working with a single process.
    So there will be a small delay even on single instance.
    
    issue8027
    review68431002

1	0	CHANGELOG
2	0	doc/topics/configuration.rst
105	27	trytond/cache.py
46	16	trytond/tests/test_cache.py

commit a88c5dd0f8eedf0fee789bd67f63c1c0f89f05d1
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2019-01-18 11:57:11 +0100

    Make Cache transactional
    
    We implement sync, commit and rollback to follow transaction semantic.
    When a transaction clears a cache, the global cache is cleared only when the
    transaction is committed meanwhile the transaction will use a cache for itself
    only.
    We remove _nocache option because the sync, commit and rollback operate only
    for the transaction.
    
    issue7975
    review53521002

Date:   2018-09-19 00:15:05 +0200

    Merge fs_values when extending record from other module

    fs_values of the original module but instead extend it. So the data is not
    considered out of sync.

1	1	trytond/backend/postgresql/database.py

commit c558b449355e0cd5fcbbf5719563b2122b0644a7
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-08-26 18:04:05 +0200

    Manage session with max_age and timeout
    
    and clear session when password is changed.
    
    The sessions are checked using on a fix maximum age of 30 days using the
    create_date value. The write_date is updated as long as the delay of the last
    update is not bigger than the session timeout.
    RPC can request a fresh session. A fresh session is a session that was updated
    last time before the session timeout. If it is not the case, the session is
    deleted and a request to create a new session is sent to the client.
    All the sessions of the users for which the password has been changed are also
    deleted in order to ensure that stolen session can no more be used.
    We use this new feature for set_preferences of user instead of duplicate the
    login mechanism.
    
    issue7568
    review53331002

2	0	CHANGELOG
5	1	doc/ref/rpc.rst
9	2	doc/topics/configuration.rst
2	1	trytond/config.py
40	4	trytond/ir/session.py
14	10	trytond/protocols/dispatcher.py
15	7	trytond/res/user.py
5	2	trytond/rpc.py
32	0	trytond/security.py

commit 39838d7659aab5ebb1ffc8ccdc56e78836c68887
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-08-07 14:00:03 +0200

    Test mimetypes instead of the accept_mimetypes tuple
    
    The property returns a list of tuple with mimetype, priority. The protocol
    must be tested against only the mimetype instead of the tuple which will
    always failed except if the type is exact.
    
    issue7598
    review64311002

commit 6b06e3221d527210f9b8ab414b245bfe16926bb3
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-06-24 16:54:46 +0200

    Check rule after indirect fields and modification
    
    The rule may depend on indirect field written latter so it must be checked
    after the storage of those fields.
    On write, the rule must be checked before the modification but also after to
    ensure users do not generate records that they can not modify after.
    
    issue7403
    review53301002

commit f41606333f032db0ca247936b8f9866c0f39f0b2
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-06-11 23:22:35 +0200

    Simplify the creation of dependencies graph
    
    There is no need to create the graph step by step with only dependencies
    already registered as far as the depth computation is propagated to all the
    children.
    Instead of searching level by level the nodes to iterate, it is faster to use
    the sort of Python.
    create_graph does not need to return its internal states but only the graph.
    The ir.module activate and update method does not need to check for missing
    dependencies because it is already checked at startup.
    
    issue7466
    review45211002

1	1	trytond/model/modelview.py
72	141	trytond/modules/__init__.py

commit d6f9490ecac06da888d9183240923d912c0a82d2
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-06-11 23:10:27 +0200

    Ensure second domain argument is a string before testing against OPERATORS
    
    If the second argument is a PYSON expression, the Python 'in' test calls
    __eq__ on it which return a PYSON Equal object between the expression and the
    operator. If the PYSON expression does not have the string type, an
    incompatibility exception is raised.
    So this operation must be prevented if the argument is not a string.
    
    issue7491
    review45251003

3	2	trytond/model/fields/field.py

commit d486065baf41ef2338043011d52741033db23285
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-03-24 13:50:47 +0100

    Add test to check that depends on _parent_ contains also the relation
    
    Otherwise, the depends decorator will set the relation to None if the record
    is not in One2Many widget. And the method will not behave the same as if the
    record was in a One2Many widget.
    And if it is an on_change call, it will remove the value on the client side.
    
    issue7249
    review45291002

commit 43076f3c0492b923f1e0cc2942eb0dce5b19685c
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-03-15 00:23:11 +0100

    Clear cache for all records of ModelSingleton
    
    As write and delete can be called with any ids for records and the super calls
    are always on the real record, the cache is only cleared for the real record.
    So ModelSingleton must ensure to clear the cache for any record ids.
    
    issue7205
    review44731002

commit 5b5cb4bca8def9ff13e569ee43d0774a19c13bbc
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-02-23 19:13:19 +0100

    Add reset password
    
    The reset password button generates a temporary random password which expires
    after 1 day and is sent to the email address of the user.
    The temporary password does not work as soon as a new password has been set.
    The trytond-admin asks the email address for admin user and has an option to
    set the admin email and to reset its password.
    
    issue7037
    review41761002

commit 3277cf3a2b1de44b0adcfe70ee70223cb03e0ad9
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2018-02-19 19:09:06 +0100

    Use unicode instead of str for DatabaseIntegrityError
    
    The exception message could contain non-ASCII errors for which standard
    __str__ may fail, but as the database should always be in UTF-8 we may except
    that unicode will not fail.
    
    issue6128
    review43971002

    - When recreating the table to drop a column, the correct SQL type must be
      converted by the database.
    - SQLite uses BOOLEAN as base type for BOOL
    
    issue7120
    review37001002

commit f7d53a635a091e5ec308905f437669c4006a54d6
Author: Sergi Almacellas Abellana <sergi@koolpi.com>
Date:   2018-02-07 12:26:59 +0100

    Do not strip trailing zeros on Decimal digits validation
    
    In order to support the 0 digits case rstrip was introduced in changeset
    d3fec5da0dbdbut it breaks the case where the number of digits is high
    as python uses manting representation when converting the float value
    to string. This causes the last trailing zero is also removed which
    breaks the validation.
    
    issue7091
    review37981002

Date:   2017-09-28 23:44:48 +0200

    So it is safer to first delete then write and finally create.

Author: Nicolas Évrard <nicoe@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-09-28 18:42:29 +0200

    Remove useless computation of module on the translations creation
    
    The .create() call for the ir.translation object guess the module of the
    translations created when the module passed is not a value evaluating to True.
    
    This could cause the unique constraint to fail when synchronizing translations
    after a report has been overriden in the interface.
    
    issue6732
    review36581002

2	0	trytond/backend/table.py

commit 3e7b9b2a0e439a355ad006d256327ff8345191de
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-05-12 12:00:44 +0200

    Convert into hash too long data name
    
    Some back-ends have constraint on the length of data name, they usually
    silently truncate them, but this can create collision. The solution is to hash
    the name when it is too long.
    
    issue4620
    issue6494

commit ac74179d966fa8ed8fc2ef9bd0f185ae8a23a865
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-04-26 19:33:32 +0200

    Ensure Many2One target join is unique if Target has history
    
    The joins added in tables must ensure to make a Cartesian product.
    So when joining on a history table, the target id is not unique so the latest
    must be used only for the join. Otherwise a search query may return multiple
    times the same id.
    
    issue6458
    review37341002

19	3	trytond/model/fields/many2one.py

commit a65bb9120ff106d4a60b796c1622630690aa6713
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-04-19 10:31:45 +0200

    Support instantiate model with _parent_ of _parent_
    
    This is a valid depends value for a field but the __init__ method lose the
    second _parent_ once it has been instantiated a first time.
    Setting _parent_ value must be done recursively.
    
    issue6441
    review40261002

commit 25ce8d5bc532fadf0ec598b5727e574678a4ba86
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-04-01 16:14:36 +0200

    Re-use method as default parameter of TableHandler add_column
    
    There is no guarantee that the method will not raise a database error on the
    first registration because it can rely on other tables being registered.
    So the method must be called only when needed. This is when the table already
    exists and has records. In this case other tables also already exist.
    
    issue6409

commit 438914ba4c51f3c61420ed6893b9684141088ba9
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-02-02 13:14:19 +0100

    Initialize earlier the ir_cache table
    
    As now the cache is managed by the Transaction, when creating the database for
    the tests, the ir_cache table should be present before the registration of the
    ir module. Also the transactions to create or drop the database should not have
    cache because either the database is not created at the start or dropped at the
    commit.
    
    issue6216
    review29171003

commit 2dcc882d5366ff25cee5212715d4607e25bb0864
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-01-29 01:15:45 +0100

    Ensure only one connection pool is created per database
    
    It is too complex and expensive to lazy create the connection pool because all
    methods which uses the pool needs to acquire a lock. So it is easier to create
    it when the instance is also created. In this case, on closing the database, it
    should be unregistered from the instances dictionary.
    
    issue6202
    review32991002

20	22	trytond/backend/postgresql/database.py

commit d974f070b0158d75b4930f4b69d35a02c9c5d5a2
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2017-01-29 01:11:57 +0100

    Make wsgi app returns Internal Server Error on exception
    
    If no protocol convert the data into a Response and if the data is an exception
    it should be returned as an Internal Server Error instead of a succeed
    response.
    The exception can be used as description for the Internal Server Error.
    
    issue6201
    review31951002

commit 399f652c37ab713282a85442c2da1efd477e7025
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-11-28 00:01:51 +0100

    Use original transaction to check created/deleted records in __raise_integrity_error
    
    The method is often called under a new transaction so the created/deleted
    records properties are cleared which makes it raises the wrong message if the
    foreign key was created during the same transaction.
    
    issue6038
    review29781002

commit c8e026a2ac9406551d9e9077857ae1919ea8a32b
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-10-20 12:02:07 +0200

    Abort User Application key creation if there are already pending one
    
    For security, we should prevent to create many keys because at that point the
    user is not authenticated and so the system could be abused.
    The measure is to prevent to create per user more than one pending key.
    
    issue5958
    review29651002

commit a97e853f13a5205f098c6014327ca0a3821f8cb9
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-09-10 23:25:03 +0200

    Add support for derivative translations
    
    This is done by calling first the getter method for the parent language for the
    terms that are not yet cached. After existing translations are set for the
    language. And finally the result is stored in the cache.
    The synchronisation wizard remove also the translations that are identical to
    their parent language.
    The method load_module_graph adds all parent languages to be loaded for
    derivation.
    
    issue5443
    review25581002

2	0	CHANGELOG
1	1	doc/topics/configuration.rst
7	3	doc/topics/translation.rst
1	1	trytond/config.py
4	4	trytond/convert.py
2	2	trytond/ir/gen_time_locale.py
1	1	trytond/ir/ir.xml

commit 7b3ac42f4b0579c18163895a82464e51942834bf
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-08-10 23:13:59 +0200

    Encode the format of Lang.strftime for Python2
    
    The changeset 83b07c8b2c2d removed the encoding by mistake.
    The encoding/decoding dance is necessary on Python2 because strftime returns
    str/bytes and converts the unicode format using ascii.
    
    issue5762
    review28621002

commit fa18a6e035f8808115b8b88f6035ee4f824b86eb
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-07-26 23:07:18 +0200

    Fix default value and check of last_timestamp of Sequence
    
    The client integer widget does not allow to display float value. So the default
    value of last_timestamp is replaced by None which fails later in the check.
    Also the check must not validate when it is not filled because in Python3 None
    and int are unorderable.
    
    issue5591
    review28571002

commit bc4a7c57994e0e63303ffa5d530796490b890bbf
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-05-31 12:49:23 +0200

    Add customizable login process
    
    It adds new configuration option to define the list of login methods.
    It defines a new Exception to use to request user data during the login
    process.
    It separates the generic login attempt protection from the actual
    authentication method.
    It replace the API of the login methods to use a dictionary of parameters
    instead of a single password.

    transaction is it was not committed.

    issue5388

commit 29673677e6447b7d11b4764675b5de623117d74b
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-03-21 23:43:22 +0100

    Improve threshold between rebuild and update MPTT
    
    Indeed we should count the number of nodes updated instead of the number of
    queries.
    
    rebuild: 1 write and 1 select on each node
    update: (1 write + 3 select + 2 write on average ½ all nodes + 1 write on child
    of id) on each ids
    
    So the threshold is:
    
    2 * count < (4 + 2 * count / 2 + 1 * x) * len(ids)
    2 * count < (4 + count + x) * len(ids)
    
    which can be approximated to
    
    2 * count < count * len(ids)
    2 < len(ids)
    
    issue5399
    review20861002

1	6	trytond/model/modelsql.py
5	3	trytond/tests/test_mptt.py

commit f766aa7e6aa247aa5b1b9e6fc3266c9a6e7c971c

    Use a separate cursor in loop to set translation

    cursor to make the update queries.

commit e79a2dd79633db8f125841426a33a047bcd858c2
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-03-05 17:26:27 +0100

    Don't remove from context the format of Binary fields
    
    The getter of the Binary field could be called many times in the same
    transaction, so popping out the format from the context create a side effect
    that changes the requested format.
    
    issue3774
    review19981002

5	0	doc/ref/models/fields.rst
2	2	trytond/ir/action.py

commit dd86b0b898a5899302860a8efa47acb77b351e9f
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-03-04 00:19:18 +0100

    Remove __setattr__ from Model
    
    This method is there to only skip the id attribute to be set using the field
    __set__ but it has a cost as it is called each time an attribute is set.
    So we store now the id value in the attribute '_id' which doesn't overload the
    field and we adapt field __get__ for this new location.
    The __getitem__ is also removed as it is deprecated since 2.6.
    
    issue5296
    review17031002

2	0	trytond/model/fields/field.py
6	19	trytond/model/model.py
1	1	trytond/model/modelstorage.py

commit d9e98340aaa4d1309079e7481da31e6aa3f03efe
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-03-01 21:46:14 +0100

    Fix SQLite greatest and least for unorderable None
    
    In Python3, None can not be ordered because it doesn't have a natural order.
    So we implement the same behaviour for SQLite than PostgreSQL which ignore NULL.
    
    issue5358
    review20821002

18	2	trytond/backend/sqlite/database.py

commit 53e7ea2366e85d39d86b1fef9a04a6a0c824cbe3
Author: Nicolas Évrard <nicoe@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-02-29 13:03:57 +0100

    Open view and icon files in binary mode
    
    Since the support of python3 has been added file_open will return unicode
    object when read in normal mode but icon files has to be considered as bytes
    and lxml.etree.fromstring expect also bytes when there is an encoding
    declaration (and not unicode).
    
    issue5354
    review17081002

1	1	trytond/ir/ui/icon.py
1	1	trytond/ir/ui/view.py

commit 2a1120bfa625ac81f197476ad274aa5c5a83ebb3
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-02-27 23:48:28 +0100

    Test values against bytes instead of str
    
    For Python3 compatibility, the test to decode should be done on bytes because
    str in Python3 is already a unicode.
    
    issue5355
    review24851004

commit 4e0b0d5ee266f71151927d8ba4cfd39738ce0e26
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-02-24 22:00:06 +0100

    Add doctest checker for Python 2-3
    
    2to3 doesn't convert unicode string of Python 2 into string of Python 3.
    So we will use a special checker that remove the 'u' prefix when checking
    output.
    
    issue3211
    review19911002

commit 0f3da15941ff4fd16f45a960d68ad44081dad0f0
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-02-09 22:45:44 +0100

    XML files must be open in binary mode for sax parser
    
    The sax parser expect a byte stream, so we must open the file with the binary
    mode. Also file_open should have a default encoding to None because encoding
    should not be set in binary mode.
    
    issue5313

commit 37e0e5ffdc019b89538f7c3162bca306a75b9d94
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2016-02-09 21:05:37 +0100

    Use assertValid instead of assert_from lxml.etree.RelaxNG
    
    2to3 convert assert_ into assertTrue but this method is not defined in lxml.
    To avoid this conversion, we use assertValid.
    
    issue5314
    review21681002

commit b485f101eccab66234e0c35f54a6cf5f7d46351e
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-10-18 16:50:41 +0200

    Reset MPTT fields when copying records
    
    The left/right fields must be reset to their default values to allow to compute
    the correct new values. As it is common to forget this requirement when
    implementing, it is safer to enforce this behaviour directly in the
    ModelStorage.copy method.
    
    issue5049
    review16741002

Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-10-15 10:44:30 +0200

    Fix order when searching view in ModelView
    
    When id is given, there is no need to perform a search otherwise only root
    views or inherited views from other model should be considered.
    Instead of explicitly define orders, it is better for modularity to use the
    default one defined on the view model.
    
    issue2041

commit a56418ee3ad9fc16628d53890ca3a1b249d34fc0
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-10-03 11:50:56 +0200

    Fix child_of domain on empty MPTT
    
    When the MPTT search returns no row, the SQL query generated has an invalid
    syntax because it uses an empty Or() clause. We replace this empty Or() by a
    Literal(False) to select nothing.
    
    issue5011
    review18651002

commit e8c4b337e3b1681f8abc11d00df3c4abe323cf2e
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2015-01-03 11:37:24 +0100

    Use NOWAIT when locking a table
    
    lock is used to enforce a serializable level for all transaction using on the
    same table. This is not achieved if transactions are waiting for the lock
    instead of abort and retry with a new transaction because they will still have
    the initial transaction row values with the repeatable read level.
    
    issue4373
    review5901002

1	1	trytond/backend/postgresql/database.py

commit 77b802ae44964ed184712d2d76e6836993f8c15c
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-11-29 10:45:12 +0100

    Use 'set' attribute to decide column creation in ModelSQL
    
    Since changeset 64681f657d55, Function fields have a sql_type so it is wrong to
    rely on this property to create or not a column. The 'set' method of field is
    already used in many places for this purpose.
    
    issue4302
    review7731002

commit 8754dac0c4b53979b55a5bda6bba12dcf33d9146
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-10-31 10:54:30 +0100

    Don't compare record values
    
    changeset 8e8f1a801098 introduced a equality comparison of records without id
    using the values.  This prevents to store in a dictonary different instances
    having by chance the same values.  So it seems better to consider only as equal
    the same instances without id.
    
    issue4306
    review10621002

commit 02705a24a40ca78f6ff40aac2f33e15c0296beec
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-10-06 22:24:16 +0200

    Avoid double evaluation from inherit with different model
    
    safe_eval forbid to evaluate '__' but PYSON encoded contains such strings. So
    with inherit from different model, the XML attributes could already been
    encoded we should prevent to evaluate them a second times because it will fail.
    
    issue4228
    review5681002

3	1	trytond/model/modelview.py

commit 3736c5017cf615c44c4318f2765f418f8c47ab06
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-10-06 22:22:08 +0200

    Use new cursor to check access in ModuleInstallUpgrade
    
    check_access take a lock on many tables and so it prevents those tables to be
    modified by the installation/upgrade process as far as the cursor is not
    closed.
    
    issue4223
    review13571002

    order/proximity of records in the cache. But when reading the values, the ids

commit c6c0ca4da71ead2f0ea5990470e16f3998ae966d
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-02-24 19:48:03 +0100

    Use bcrypt to hash password if possible
    
    If bcrypt is not available, it fallbacks to sha1 but it will use bcrypt to hash
    new password if available.
    The storage uses a simple hashing scheme which eases to add new hashing method
    and doesn't rely anymore on the specific Sha field but on Function field.
    
    Thanks to Vishesh Yadav
    
    review1039002

1	0	setup.py
95	29	trytond/res/user.py

1	1	trytond/res/view/user_form_preferences.xml
62	0	trytond/tests/test_user.py

commit 66a5f7b6f4afd3a9358e95ef36ccc8fa7f02b344
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-02-24 19:20:47 +0100

    When saving record don't store target link for one2many to create
    
    When saving an instance if the relation field of a one2many item is set, it
    should not try to save it as it will be replaced by the current record. And in
    the worst case, the target set could not be valid and so it prevents to store
    the instance which doesn't need of this target.
    
    issue3501
    review3601003

3	0	trytond/model/modelstorage.py

commit 2680d1b746baceb60ca6cf4feee95dbf2c0bd5fb
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2014-02-24 19:15:57 +0100

commit ce781a5d0e9ecec76eda1e2b5b03a3b3e7f2d035
Author: Albert Cervera i Areny <albert@nan-tic.com>
Date:   2013-12-19 20:58:13 +0100

    Use EXCLUSIVE MODE when locking PostgreSQL tables.
    
    Previous implementation used ACCESS EXCLUSIVE MODE (PostgreSQL's default) which
    does not allow SELECTs on the locked table. This is too pessimistic so it's been
    replaced by a plain EXCLUSIVE MODE which still blocks INSERTs and UPDATEs
    but not SELECTs.
    
    review1011002
    issue2280

1	1	trytond/backend/postgresql/database.py

commit e8bdcd5550dff9d5d5051aaa9ce60abb4f63abc4
Author: Nicolas Évrard <nicoe@b2ck.com>
Date:   2013-12-10 12:01:30 +0100

    Set the context's user when fetching user preferences
    
    The call to _get_preferences makes some processing based on the user of the
    context.
    
    In order for those computations to return the right value the context must be
    set when instanciating the user.
    
    issue3068
    review1711002

commit b03788e6dbb3c2f238a7e0dd861fcfa255f2a1e3
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2013-09-22 14:33:39 +0200

    Fix duplicate translations
    
    - Fix unique constraint by using -1 instead of NULL for res_id
    - Clean duplicate entries in po file
    
    The unique constraint was not working when res_id was NULL because SQL consider
    all of them as different.
    
    The migration could fail if there is duplicate translation in the database. So
    this query must be run until no more records are deleted:
    
    DELETE FROM ir_translation WHERE id IN (SELECT MAX(id) FROM ir_translation GROUP BY name, res_id, lang, type, src_md5, module HAVING COUNT(1) > 1);
    
    issue3355
    review1087004

38	23	trytond/ir/translation.py
2	2	trytond/model/fields/field.py
1	1	trytond/report/report.py
0	182	trytond/res/locale/fr_FR.po
0	12	trytond/webdav/locale/fr_FR.po

commit e14c671c4d097489924db46efed49454aacb6945
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2013-06-26 22:45:36 +0200

    Order ir.model by model instead of translatable name
    
    ir.model as a core model is often as many2one but ordering by the translatable
    name is quite slower because of the join with the translation table so better
    to prevent the join by using the model field.
    
    review954002

commit 2e8ec5f5df0bcb80e2cb36291f73a3cee0780b13
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2013-04-14 23:17:55 +0200

    Replace SPLIT_PART by SUBSTR and POSITION
    
    SPLIT_PART is not a standard SQL function (it is not supported by MySQL).
    SUBSTR is used even if it is not standard SQL because SUBSTRING is not
    supported by SQLite. This will change once we will migrate to python-sql.
    
    review784002

12	0	trytond/backend/sqlite/database.py

commit 0ce761dd27fb9d63dfedd4bb8ca7e7b080c01247
Author: Ralf Peschke <rpeschke@peschke-it.de>
Date:   2013-04-13 11:07:33 +0200

    Use value instead of record instance on import_data
    
    Importing records with m2o- and m2m-relations import_data gives record instances
    to the create-method of the object instead of record-id's. Creating the same
    object using the GUI the client gives record-id's.
    On error the record-instances can't be serialized by JSON and the common error
    "500 internal server error" will be reported to the client
    
    issue3124
    review767002
    (transplanted from 6426b8830dd72bdc89891709dbd319d924384cd1)

2	2	trytond/model/modelstorage.py

commit 9c6ff8c0e0ae43699ef375deaa2ebdbd58a74e96

    Importing records with m2o- and m2m-relations import_data gives record instances
    to the create-method of the object instead of record-id's. Creating the same
    object using the GUI the client gives record-id's.
    On error the record-instances can't be serialized by JSON and the common error
    "500 internal server error" will be reported to the client
    
    issue3124
    review767002

2	2	trytond/model/modelstorage.py

Date:   2013-04-13 10:29:37 +0200

    unit-test: on import_data zero values shouldn't be converted to None
    
    import_data method converts zero values to None. As a consequence such records
    don't pass the required constraint for such fields
    
    issue3136

commit 841f14f8fedd117acfe20b7ffd96f9eec8fd6fcc
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2012-09-24 11:36:39 +0200

    Fix read related values of reference fields
    
    By using just only the id to store the related values, it could result a mixing
    of different model with the same id. So now, it uses the reference value.
    (transplanted from fb51f5b4aa4c504466cd75db60bf23bc9053209b)

2	2	trytond/model/modelsql.py

commit ef6351983cb1655da809632773a01379331a148c
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2012-02-08 16:14:25 +0100

    Better management of redirect
    
    Some web browsers don't support correctly empty content.
    Others don't follow no-HTTP protocol in location header so we use
    http-equiv="Refresh".
    And finally show a simple link for very old web browsers.
    
    review233001

commit f1d141d4bcd3a63963889ebc60703a1e71c4f6c3
Author: Craig Barnes <cjbarnes18@gmail.com>
Date:   2011-11-13 21:29:09 +0000

    Disable cron for new database during initialisation
    
    During database creation CRON error can be observed in the error log.
    In slower machines the timing of the errors can cause a deadlock state as
    the database is added to the cron while the cron tables are being initialised.
    This leaves the database in an inconsistent and unusable state for the user.
    
    To correct this I have exposed the pool lock by adding a lock property, and
    required the server to acquire a lock on the database pool before it can start a
    thread for it.
    
    issue2234
    review173001

7	0	trytond/pool.py
7	2	trytond/server.py

commit acfd5dc13463f9665e75aa3178a1710144cf3576
Merge: edc27209 0a471486

commit ec4c38b84a3dc706b188ee931a1e680246c2c7a0
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2011-10-17 09:47:26 +0200

    Switch from SERIALIZABLE to REPEATABLE_READ isolation level of PostgreSQL
    
    Until before PostgreSQL 9.1 serializable was the same as repeatable read.
    As we use explicit locking, repeatable read is enough.
    
    review151006

    dictionary that will be taken.

commit 0415e46c73f1150dff178bfee803f433dfe6aaae
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2010-03-12 17:41:07 +0100

    Don't allow to use float in Numeric fields
    
    The goal is to prevent to introduce float errors in Numeric fields.
    There is a trick for external protocols like XML-RPC and JSON-RPC where the
    string representation is stored in the Float object and will be used to
    convert it into Decimal.

commit 4488f9959366a1c1ace8c8f82c8ee7feaf9dc674
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2010-03-11 12:08:15 +0100

    Use Tryton CHECK constraint for MySQL
    
    MySQL has only partial constraints, it doesn't manage CHECK.
    So we use Tryton to check those constraints.

1	1	trytond/backend/mysql/database.py

commit 596c8fce393e7d0be1dbd154aad2c5cb3f4042b6
Author: Cédric Krier <ced@b2ck.com>
Date:   2010-03-11 12:02:29 +0100

    Use double instead of float to store Float fields in MySQL
    
    The precision of MySQL float is not enough to handle all Python floats.
    From http://docs.python.org/tutorial/floatingpoint.html:
    "...almost all platforms map Python floats to IEEE-754 “double precision”"

1	1	trytond/backend/mysql/fields.py
1	1	trytond/backend/mysql/table.py
